pr_title: Fix drop item effect throwing error

timeline.message: ItemUtils - add a check for isItem since Material#isItem was introduced in 1.12
EffDrop - fix issue attempting to drop a non item

timeline.author: bensku

timeline.bodyText: Maybe name it with hasItemForm or something like that. Materials are not items themselves.
timeline.author: bensku

timeline.message: ItemUtils - small name change for isItem -> hasItemForm (javadocs to reflect)
